turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about The Horses.
turn.1: Who wrote the song The Horses?
turn.2: The Horses "The Horses" is a song written by Rickie Lee Jones and Walter Becker.
turn.4: It was originally performed by Jones on her 1989 album "Flying Cowboys".
turn.6: While not released as a single, the original version did appear in the 1996 film "Jerry Maguire" and was also included on the film's soundtrack.
turn.8: The song was covered in 1990 by Daryl Braithwaite, which reached No. 1 in Australia.
turn.10: The song was covered by Daryl Braithwaite on his 1990 album "Rise".
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: It was released as a single in January 1991 and reached No. 1 on the Australian Singles Chart in May. "The Horses" has been certified 6× platinum in Australia by the Australian Recording Industry Association.
